languages.text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Атаки архмилитанта {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g}, как в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, так и дистанционные, уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} всех противников, получивших попадание, на 2, а {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} — на 7% до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Any area attacks of the Veteran, both melee and ranged, reduce deflection of all the enemies hit by −3 and their armour by −10% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Any of the Veteran's area attacks, both melee and ranged, reduce the deflection of all the enemies hit by −3 and their armour by −10% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

Does not stack.

Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. languages.text: 首席战士所有{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，无论是{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}还是远程攻击，都会使所有被命中敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低2点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低7%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 老兵所有范围攻击，无论是近战还是{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击，都会使所有被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低3点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低10%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} del Archimilitante, sea {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} o a distancia, reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de los enemigos impactados en −2 y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} un −7 % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

traits.locale_text: Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} del Archimilitante, sea cuerpo a cuerpo o {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} en −3 y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} un −10 % hasta el final del combate. traits.locale_text: Атаки ветерана по области, как в ближнем бою, так и {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционные{/g}, уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} всех противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, на 3, а {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} — на 10% до конца боя. languages.text: Beliebige {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}- und Fernkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} des Erzmilitanten reduzieren bis zum Ende des Kampfes die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} sämtlicher getroffenen Feinde um −2 und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −7 %. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Beliebige Nahkampf- und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} des Erzmilitanten reduzieren bis zum Ende des Kampfes die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} sämtlicher {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Feinde um −3 und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −10 %. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} de l'archimilitant, en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} ou à distance, réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ensemble des ennemis touchés de −2 et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −7 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les attaques de zone du Vétéran, en mêlée ou {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ensemble des ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} de -3 et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de -10 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Başmilitan'ın hem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} hem de menzilli {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g} tüm düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini 2, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini ise %7 azaltır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Any of the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}, both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and ranged, reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of all the enemies hit by −2 and their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
